00032 /*
00033  * Marsheller Helper Header Library. 
00034  * This will be created as a separate header file & 
00035  * the functions will be available to the above C Program.   
00036  * Header File Name: "XDRMarshaller.h"
00037  */

00039 /* This definition is for integer */
00040 #define INT_BYTES               4       
00041 #define SHORT_INT_BYTES          2
00042 #define BYTE_BYTES               1
00043 
00044 /* This definition is for unsigned integer */
00045 #define U_INT_MAXCOUNT_4                4               
00046 #define U_INT_MAXCOUNT_2                2               
00047 #define U_INT_MAXCOUNT_1                1               
00048 
00049 /* This definition is for double */
00050 #define DOUBLE_EXPONENT_BITS            12
00051 #define DOUBLE_MANTISSA_BITS            52
00052 #define DOUBLE_HEXA_BYTES               8
00053 #define DOUBLE_HEXA_BITS                16
00054 #define DOUBLE_CONSTANT                 1023
00055 
00056 /* This definition is for float */
00057 #define FLOAT_HEXA_BYTES                4
00058 #define FLOAT_HEXA_BITS                 8
00059 #define FLOAT_EXPONENT_BITS             9
00060 #define FLOAT_MANTISSA_BITS             32
00061 #define FLOAT_CONSTANT                  127
00062 #define HYPER_MAX_BYTES                 8
00063 
00064 /* This definition is for integer */
00065 int convReadIntHexToInt(int count, char iHexa[3]);
00066 void convReadIntCharHexToInt(char *phex, int *pSB);
00067 int read_long(void* pStream);
00068 
00069 /* This definition is for unsigned integer */
00070 unsigned int convReadUIntHexToInt(int count, char iHexa[3]);
00071 void convReadUIntCharHexToInt(char *hex, int *SB);
00072 unsigned int read_u_long(void* pStream);
00073 
00074 /* This definition is for double */
00075 double getReadDoubleMantissa(char Mantissa[DOUBLE_MANTISSA_BITS]);
00076 int getReadDoubleExponent(char Exponent[DOUBLE_EXPONENT_BITS     ]);
00077 int convReadDoubleHexToBinary(char hexa, char binary[4]);
00078 double read_double(void *streamPtr);
00079 
00080 /* This definition is for float */
00081 float getFloatReadMantissa(char Mantissa[FLOAT_MANTISSA_BITS]);
00082 int getFloatReadExponent(char Exponent[FLOAT_EXPONENT_BITS]);
00083 int convFloatReadHexToBinary(char hexa, char binary[4]);
00084 float read_float(void *streamPtr);
00085 
00086 /* This definition is for String */
00087 char* read_string(int length, void* pStream);
00088 
00089 /* This definition is for UTF8String */
00090 /* Signature change to pass the schemaVersion parameter */
00091 wchar* read_wstring(int length, void* pStream, char* schemaVer);
00092 
00093 /* This definition is for Byte Array */
00094 /* Signature change to pass the schemaVersion parameter */
00095 byte* read_octet_array(int length, void* pStream, char* schemaVer);
00096 
00097 /* This definition is for Hyper */
00098 hyper hyperReadHexToInt(int count, char iHexa[3]);
00099 void convReadHyperCharHexToInt(char *hex, hyper *SB);
00100 hyper* read_longlong(void* pStream);
00101

00104 void convReadUnHyperCharHexToInt(char *hex, u_hyper *SB);
00105 u_hyper* read_u_longlong(void* pStream);
